title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe an action, other than advancing legislation, that members of Congress may take to bring transparency and accountability to the Federal Reserve.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the proposal to increase transparency and accountability described in Part A would affect the Federal Reserveâ€™s ability to make economic policy.

For Task C, the response must explain how the ideological perspective of the Democratic Party would likely affect how it would address these economic issues compared to the Republican Party.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all three of the tasks set by the question.
